ADR-XXXX — Title#

  • Status: Proposed

  • Date: YYYY-MM-DD

  • Deciders: [List of people involved in decision]

  • Technical Story: [Link to GitHub issue, JIRA ticket, etc.]

Context#

Describe the situation that led to this decision. Include:

  • What problem are we trying to solve?

  • What constraints do we face?

  • What requirements must be met?

  • What is the current state?

Decision#

State the decision clearly. Include:

  • What will we do?

  • How will we implement it?

  • Why is this the best option?

  • What principles guide this choice?

Consequences#

Positive#

  • Benefit 1: Description of positive outcome

  • Benefit 2: Another positive outcome

  • …

Negative#

  • Cost 1: Description of negative consequence

  • Risk 1: Potential negative outcome

  • …

Neutral#

  • Impact 1: Neither positive nor negative outcome

  • Change 1: Required changes to existing systems

  • …

Alternatives Considered#

Option A: [Alternative Name]#

  • Pros: What makes this appealing?

  • Cons: What are the downsides?

  • Rejected because: Why didn’t we choose this?

Option B: [Alternative Name]#

  • Pros: Benefits of this approach

  • Cons: Drawbacks and limitations

  • Rejected because: Reason for rejection

Implementation#

If the decision requires specific implementation steps:

  1. Step 1: What needs to be done first

  2. Step 2: Next action required

  3. Step 3: Final implementation step

Notes#

Any additional context, references, or related decisions:

  • Links to related ADRs

  • References to external documentation

  • Background research or spikes performed

  • Team discussion notes

Status History#

  • YYYY-MM-DD: Proposed by [Name]

  • YYYY-MM-DD: Accepted by [Team/Committee]

  • YYYY-MM-DD: Status changed to [New Status] because [Reason]
